definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Committee for Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland (North Korean)
pinyin: Zu3 guo2 He2 ping2 Tong3 yi1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: So I want to see my great motherland to achieve peaceful reunification as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我願意看到我們的偉大祖國能夠儘早實現和平統一。

sentences.english: Island of peaceful reunification days not very far.
sentences.chinese: 島和平統一的日子不會很遠了。

sentences.english: A peaceful reunification is greater than having gold.
sentences.chinese: 和平統一，遠勝過黃金和彩虹的輝耀。

sentences.english: A peaceful reunification is greater than gold and rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 和平統一的祝福，如彩虹般輝耀。

sentences.english: This is a law advancing peaceful unification between the sides.
sentences.chinese: 這是法律前進在邊之間的和平統一。

sentences.english: The state shall do its utmost with maximum sincerity to achieve a peaceful reunification.
sentences.chinese: 國家以最大的誠意，盡最大的努力，實現和平統一。

sentences.english: Irish governments have sought the peaceful reunification of Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 愛爾蘭政府尋求和平統一的政策。
